docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, March 21.--If the International Congress of American Democracies succeeds in achieving anything in favor of democracy, it will have to accomplish it clandestinely and in the nature of a conspiracy behind closed doors.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, March 23.--Every Latin-American Government is a "republic" in the official view of the Administration, regardless of the status of its internal affairs, Sumner Welles, Acting Secretary of State, emphasized in testimony before the Senate...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, March 23.--Every Latin-American Government is a "republic" in the official view of the Administration, regardless of the status of its internal affairs, Sumner Welles, Acting Secretary of State, emphasized in testimony before the Senate Foreign Relations Committee made public today.

docs.snippet: MONTVIDEO, Uruguay, March 24.--The International Congress of American Democracies closed its sessions here tonight convinced that it had laid the foundations for a vast militant Inter-American Popular Front movement somewhat similar to that which...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTVIDEO, Uruguay, March 24.--The International Congress of American Democracies closed its sessions here tonight convinced that it had laid the foundations for a vast militant Inter-American Popular Front movement somewhat similar to that which recently won control of the government of Chile.
docs.abstract: cong closes after Argentine delegates withdraw as protest against police restrictions; adopts resolutions; sets up permanent bur in Montevideo as clearing house
